name: Pen to Paper!
description:
For me, starting is one of the hardest parts of making something. Especially for a game jam. Putting a mark on paper is difficult... And that's the inspiration for Pen to Paper!

Just make something. Make anything for that matter! The pen is yours and you can do it. I believe in you. I made this silly little thing and I feel very rewarded, so don't set your bar too high.

(Yes, you can draw between pages. It's a feature, use it wisely.)
